content: the nate hoodie is a comfortable modern style hoodie it is knit from the top down starting at the neckline with the hood added on afterwards the best feature of the hood is no grafting it is quick and fun to knit the pattern is available in a worsted weight version for sizes 3m/16 chest size - 10 y/28 chest size and bulky weight version for size 3m/16 chest size - 6y/25 chest size pattern yardage requirements **worsted weight - 20st/4 gauge** sizes 3m 6m 9m 12m 18m 24m 3y 4y 5y 6y 8y 10y *main colour* - 240/220 280/260 300/275 300/275 350/320 400/365 450/415 500/460 550/505 600/550 675/620 750/690 yards/meters *contrast colour* - 110/100 120/110 150/140 150/140 200/185 200/185 200/185 200/185 200/185 200/185 250/230 250/230 yards/meters **bulky weight - 16st/4 gauge** sizes - 3m 6m 9m 12m 18m 24m 3y 4y 5y 6y *main colour* - 200/185 250/230 250/230 250/230 300/275 350/320 400/370 450/415 500/460 550/505 yards/meters *contrast colour* - 75/70 125/115 150/140 150/140 150/140 175/160 175/160 200/185 200/185 225/210 yards/meters 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/indie-design-gift-a-long 2 http //www ravelry com/bundles/3894
